          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Effectiveness of light bulbs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wirksamkeit der Glühlampen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Efficacité des ampoules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Eficácia de bulbos claros</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Efficacia delle lampadine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αποτελεσματικότητα των ελαφριών βολβών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Eficacia de bombillas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how placing white shiny reflectors around a light bulb increases the effectiveness of the light bulb.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Directions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lamp</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light bulbs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lighting</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">shiny surfaces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">white surfaces</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie das Plazieren der 
weißen glänzenden Reflektoren um eine Glühlampe die Wirksamkeit der
Glühlampe erhöht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment le placement 
des réflecteurs brillants blancs autour d'une ampoule augmente 
l'efficacité de l'ampoule.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como colocar os refletores
brilhantes brancos em torno de um bulbo claro aumenta a eficácia do 
bulbo claro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come disporre i 
riflettori lucidi bianchi intorno ad una lampadina aumenta l'efficacia
della lampadina.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς η τοποθέτηση των 
άσπρων λαμπρών ανακλαστήρων γύρω από έναν ελαφρύ βολβό 
αυξάνει την αποτελεσματικότητα του ελαφριού βολβού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo la colocación de
los reflectores brillantes blancos alrededor de una bombilla aumenta 
la eficacia de la bombilla.</string>
          </description>
